name: code-review
description: Review code changes against pplx-sdk architecture conventions, type safety, error handling, and testing standards.

target.description: File path, directory, or PR diff to review

focus.description: Specific aspect to focus on (layers, types, errors, tests, all)

outputs.findings: List of issues found with severity and location

prompt: Review the following code for compliance with pplx-sdk architecture conventions. Check: (1) imports respect core → shared → transport → domain → client layer order, (2) all public APIs have complete type annotations and Google-style docstrings, (3) custom exceptions from pplx_sdk.core.exceptions are used, (4) tests follow Arrange-Act-Assert with test_<module>_<behavior> naming. Target: {{target}}, Focus: {{focus}}
